text: Hey everyone - I am having issues with mobile load due to javascript - any ideas?
(it is a HubSpot website built a few years a go by another agency)
can you descibre your problem, what you expect and possibly a link for review?

I was going to guess that <@U03U73ZRMB9> is referring to possibly a lighthouse score or something, and would need to optimize, and if it was built years ago, <@U3T21PDBK> is telling you the path of least resistance. Generally jumping into these older sites is a journey, and depending on what type of system they used, it could be a really really terrible journey that will make you contemplate your career choice.
